H2584.def: = woman; ► wife of {L:Elkanah<SDBH:אֶלְקָנָה>}; mother of {L:Samuel<SDBH:שְׁמוּאֵל>}; co-wife of {L:Peninnah<SDBH:פְּנִנָּה>}

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H6419.def: = state in which humans regard an event as likely to happen

H3820.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H7337.def: = state in which an object is large in size

H341.def: = state in which someone is engaged in a conflict with  someone else and acts accordingly

H8055.def: = state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy

H3444.def: = causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue or protection (of humans in need) implying success

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H6918.def: = state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1115.def: = particle marking a proposition as not true

H6697.def: = hard stony material ◄ that forms the crust of the earth, sometimes exposed on the surface, sometimes hidding under the soil; ≈ associated with hardness, permanence, and security

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H1364.def: = state in which a person or object is of great or more than average height; ≈ associated with status

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H410.def: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H1844.def: = state in which humans or deities are acquainted with facts, truths, or principles, as a result of experience, study or investigation

H5949.def: = an activity performed by a person or deity

H8505.def: = action by which humans or deities determine the weight or size of an object

H7198.def: = a strong but flexible piece of wood to which a string is attached for the firing of arrows, ► used for hunting or as weapon of war

H1368.def: = a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

H2844.def: = state of being broken or destroyed; ≈ associated with hardship

H3782.def: = process by which humans trip or temporarily lose their balance when walking; ≈ often used figuratively to denote failure

H247.def: = to wear a belt or girdle around one's waist

H7649.def: = process by which someone's desire for food is fulfilled

H7936.def: = action by which humans make their services available to other humans for a limited amount of time and in return for payment

H3899.def: = a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general

H7457.def: = condition of not having food to eat, often leading to weakness

H2308.def: = process by which objects stop existing in this world

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H6135.def: = state in which humans or animals, whether male or female, are unable to procreate

H7651.def: = state in which a countable entity is seven in number

H7227.def: = state in which an object is very large in size

H535.def: = state of being unable to function as can be expected; ◄ as a result of destruction, a drought, or God's direct intervention; ► results include weakness, sadness, shame, death, and disintegration, depending on the situation

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H4191.def: = process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

H2421.def: = process by which humans are alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity

H3381.def: = process by which objects move (involuntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

H7585.def: = abode of the dead, a place of darkness and silence, located deep in the earth and inaccessible, where there is neither compassion nor wisdom; ≈ regarded as a place that is never satisfied; often personified; going there before one's time is considered a punishment

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3423.def: = process by which humans gain ownership of land and other possessions, which often implies that these possessions will be passed on to the next generation

H637.def: = the two external openings in the nose

H1800.def: = a hinged barrier at the entrance to a building or room; ≈ used metaphorically to denote a person's lips with special focus on the lip's ability to shut the mouth

H6083.def: = the loose natural substance of the earth's surface

H34.def: = person who does not have the means to provide for himself/herself, economically or otherwise, and therefore depends on help from other people and God

H830.def: = heap of dung, ashes, and other garbage, ◄ probably located outside of a population center; ≈ associated with poverty and low status

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H5081.def: = state in which humans are willing to perform a certain task and show that by their actions

H5157.def: = action by which humans or deities take permanent possession of objects, humans, or property, either by inheritance or force

H3678.def: = large elaborate seat used by people in a position of authority or wealth

H3519.def: = position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority

H4690.def: = a tall vertical structure, usually of stone, used as a support for a construction

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H7896.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H8398.def: primarily used in poetry: = the earth as opposed to the sky, with special focus on the area that is inhabited by humans

H8104.def: = action by which humans or deities carefully observe an object or event for a longer period of time

H7272.def: = the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and --by extension-- of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H2623.def: = someone who practices חֶסֶד, who is committed towards fulfilling his/her obligations; these may be obligations defined within the context of a covenant or agreement, or moral obligations to do well to someone who did well to you before

H7563.def: = state in which a person's behavior is inconsistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior

H2822.def: = state in which there is no light, ◄ caused by the fact that the light of sun, moon, and stars cannot reach the location that is in focus, ► resulting in a state in which no one can readily see, and colors and shapes can no longer be distinguished; loved by the wicked only; ≈ associated with hardship, ignorance, death, and oblivion

H3581.def: = state in which humans, animals or deities have the ability to perform actions, or to prevail in, or endure situations that require the exertion or mustering of effort or force

H1396.def: = process by which humans gain strength, power, and authority, which enables them to do things that others are unable to accomplish

H7378.def: = action by which humans initiate a possible argument or conflict with other humans or with a deity by accusing them of wrongdoing or by taking action in a different way

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H5181.def: = action by which humans or supernatural beings move down from a place of higher elevation

H8064.def: = the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H5797.def: = state in which an object is able to withstand force

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H4899.def: = a (non-eschatological) ruler appointed by God and anointed with oil by a prophet or priest

26.gl: ends of the earth > all people on earth

42.gl: to lift up (someone's) horn > to restore (someone's) confidence

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H7414.def: = an elevation of the earth’s surface rising gradually and to a relatively small height from the surrounding level; generally lower than a {L:mountain<SDBH:הַר>}

H5288.def: = a young male, ranging from childhood to adulthood; ► often in the service of other people; ≈ typically regarded as healthy and physically strong, but also lacking the experience and wisdom of the {L:older men<SDBH:זָקֵן>}

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H3045.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H8050.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Elkanah<SDBH:אֶלְקָנָה>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► judge and {L:prophet<SDBH:נָבִיא>}

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H1432.def: = process by which objects increase in size

H2895.def: = state in which objects are of a high quality and/or a pleasure to look at

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1540.def: = action by which someone takes off his/her clothes, either entirely or in part, ► as a result of which that person becomes naked or improperly dressed, ≈ which is considered a shameful thing to do

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H7626.def: = stick ◄ usually made of wood; ► attribute of a shepherd or a ruler, but also used for other purposes, such as beating, walking, fighting, etc.; ≈ associated with shepherding, authority, punishment

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H977.def: = action by which someone makes a selection among several options, which include humans, divine beings, animals, other objects, or events

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H4196.def: = construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices

H7004.def: = smoke ◄ produced by burning sacrifice or incense ► in order to please God with its smell

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H646.def: = garment; reaching from the shoulders to the waist; ◄ made from linen; ► normally worn by {L:priests<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}, but also by {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>} when the ark was brought to Jerusalem

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H4100.def: = a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

H1163.def: = action by which a human or animal strikes forcibly with the foot; ≈ associated with disobedience and rebellion

H2077.def: = the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and the other part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H4583.def: = a location that deities, humans or animals have made their dwelling place; ≈ associated with security
